bow: could use mommit help for mother day surprise hey mommit have an idea for mother day gift that ca pull off without the help and kindness of others so immediately turn to reddit my wife has slowly given every last piece of her sanity and energy to caring for our son 9mo and daughter and in return is fraught with guilt and disappointment that every day she could have been better mom our daughter who is autistic is still unable to say more than very small selection of words which prevents her from saying the reassuring love you or happy that makes each difficult day melt away for mom our children both have endless opportunity and adventure ahead in their lives and for mother day like to give my wife glimpse of what that future could be we ve always hoped that they would travel the world find joy in every situation and simply let us know that they re bright spot in someone day that where you come in mommit could you spare moment to write very brief postcard to my wife from either my daughter or son giving glimpse into the joy of their life in your part of the world if you live in seattle tell her about how it really does rain as much as they say and the new job is going
